main.bio: I am Christopher Ezike, a Full-Stack Software Engineer with 5+ year's experience Developing and Building Complex Technology, Webapps, Mobile/Native Apps, Progressive Webapps(PWA's), My Passion is to explore technology, i am a big fan of blockchain Technology!!! Aside from Coding, I spend time working Educating Junior/Rising  Developers @CodeMythology.com, Lover of  HipHop Music Football and Nigerian Food.....
